home.title: Premium Knife Store
home.description: A store of premium knives made from high-strength steels. Reliability, sharpness and style for EDC users, collectors and connoisseurs of quality tools.
home.keywords: EDC knives, collectible knives, premium knives, buy knife, knife store, high-end steel knives

store.title: Premium Knife Catalog
store.description: A catalog of elite knives made from high-strength steels. Professional EDC and collectible models for true quality enthusiasts.
store.keywords: knife catalog, premium knives, EDC knives, collectible knives

tip1.title: The strength that trust
tip1.description: Our knives are made using powder metallurgy technology, which makes them incredibly resistant to chipping and impact. This is steel that withstands the demands of the real world.

tip2.title: Ready for any environment
tip2.description: 18% chromium and molybdenum provide excellent corrosion resistance. Rain, humidity, blood, plant juices — none of it is a problem. Your knife stays like new no matter the conditions.

aboutUs.title:
Excellence
in Every Detail
aboutUs.description1: We source raw materials directly from the manufacturer and perform both cryogenic and traditional heat treatment ourselves.
aboutUs.description2: No matter how hard the steel is, all knives require regular sharpening and maintenance.
